name: Last Stand in the Woods
description:
On a freezing day in fall, you are stranded in a forest full of zombies. 

You had an accident. Your truck broke down in the middle of nowhere. There is no reception. You shot a flare gun and now you have to survive until the rescue team comes.

PS: This is a very brief game of 10 minutes.
